Button codes regarding AA_Comedor IR controller:
Button Code - On_Off: 0x3c160200a #Binary: 001111000001011000000010000000001010
Button Code - Swing: 0x3c160010a  #Binary: 001111000001011000000000000100001010
Button Code - Up: 0x3c1600006     #Binary: 001111000001011000000000000000000110
Button Code - Down: 0x3c160000a   #Binary: 001111000001011000000000000000001010
